src.name: xllog_logback
src.title: Logback configuration to show errorUrl value

xml.src:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <configuration>
<appender name="STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender"> <encoder> <pattern>[%d{dd/MM HH:mm:ss}]|%logger|%-5level|%thread| %X{errorUrl} | %msg\n</pattern> </encoder> </appender>
<appender name="ASYNC_STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender"> <appender-ref ref="STDOUT" /> </appender>
<root level="DEBUG"> <appender-ref ref="ASYNC_STDOUT"/> </root>
</configuration>
